us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces

Interface Pose2DBasics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable, Pose2DReadOnly, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FixedFramePose2DBasics, FramePose2DBasics
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FramePose2D, Pose2D

    public interface Pose2DBasics
extends Pose2DReadOnly, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable
    Write and read interface for a pose 2D.

    A pose 2D represents a position and orientation in the XY-plane.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void appendRotation(double yaw)
      Adds the given yaw angle to the orientation of this pose 2D.
      default void appendRotation(Orientation2DReadOnly orientation)
      Adds the given orientation to the orientation of this pose 2D.

      Rotates, then adds the translation (x, y) to this pose 2D.

      Rotates, then adds the given translation to this pose 2D.

      Transforms the position and orientation parts of this pose 2D by the inverse of the given transform.

        Sets this pose 2D from the given position and yaw angle.
        Parameters:

        yaw - the angle used to initialize the pose's orientation.

        orientation - the orientation with the new angle value for this. Not modified.

      • set

        default void set(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.RigidBodyTransform rigidBodyTransform)
        Sets this pose 2D to match the given rigid-body transform.

        The given transform has to represent a 2D transformation.

        Parameters:
        rigidBodyTransform - the transform use to set this pose 2D. Not modified.
        Throws:
        us.ihmc.euclid.exceptions.NotAMatrix2DException - if the rotation part of the transform does not represent a 2D transformation.

      • set

        default void set(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.RigidBodyTransform rigidBodyTransform,
                 boolean checkIsTransform2D)
        Sets this pose 2D to match the given rigid-body transform.
        Parameters:
        rigidBodyTransform - the transform use to set this pose 2D. Not modified.
        checkIsTransform2D - indicates whether or not the method should check that the rotation part of the given transform represents a 2D rotation in the XY-plane.
        Throws:
        us.ihmc.euclid.exceptions.NotAMatrix2DException - if checkIsTransform2D is true and if the rotation part of the transform does not represent a 2D transformation.

      • interpolate

        default void interpolate(Pose2DReadOnly other,
                         double alpha)
        Performs a linear interpolation from this to other given the percentage alpha.

        this.position = (1.0 - alpha) * this.position + alpha * other.position
        this.orientation = (1.0 - alpha) * this.orientation + alpha * other.orientation

        Parameters:
        other - the other pose 2D used for the interpolation. Not modified.
        alpha - the percentage used for the interpolation. A value of 0 will result in not modifying this, while a value of 1 is equivalent to setting this to other.

      • interpolate

        default void interpolate(Pose2DReadOnly pose1,
                         Pose2DReadOnly pose2,
                         double alpha)
        Performs a linear interpolation from pose1 to pose2 given the percentage alpha.

        this.position = (1.0 - alpha) * pose1.position + alpha * pose2.position
        this.orientation = (1.0 - alpha) * pose1.orientation + alpha * pose2.orientation

        Parameters:
        pose1 - the first pose 2D used in the interpolation. Not modified.
        pose2 - the second pose 2D used in the interpolation. Not modified.
        alpha - the percentage to use for the interpolation. A value of 0 will result in setting this to pose1, while a value of 1 is equivalent to setting this to pose2.

      • prependTranslation

        default void prependTranslation(double x,
                                double y)
        Adds the translation (x, y) to this pose 2D assuming it is expressed in the coordinates in which this pose is expressed.

        If the translation is expressed in the local coordinates described by this pose 2D, use appendTranslation(double, double).

        Parameters:
        x - the translation distance along the x-axis.
        y - the translation distance along the y-axis.

      • prependTranslation

        default void prependTranslation(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Tuple2DReadOnly translation)
        Adds the given translation to this pose 2D assuming it is expressed in the coordinates in which this pose is expressed.

        If the translation is expressed in the local coordinates described by this pose 2D, use appendTranslation(Tuple2DReadOnly).

        Parameters:
        translation - tuple containing the translation to apply to this pose 2D. Not modified.

      • prependRotation

        default void prependRotation(double yaw)
        Rotates the position part of this pose 2D by yaw and adds yaw to the orientation part.

        If the rotation should not affect this pose's position, use appendRotation(double).

        Parameters:
        yaw - the angle about the z-axis to prepend to this pose 2D.

      • prependRotation

        default void prependRotation(Orientation2DReadOnly orientation)
        Rotates the position part of this pose 2D by orientation and adds orientation to the orientation part.

        If the rotation should not affect this pose's position, use appendRotation(Orientation2DReadOnly).

        Parameters:
        orientation - the orientation to prepend to this pose 2D. Not modified.

      • appendTranslation

        default void appendTranslation(double x,
                               double y)
        Rotates, then adds the translation (x, y) to this pose 2D.

        Use this method if the translation (x, y) is expressed in the local coordinates described by this pose 2D. Otherwise, use prependTranslation(double, double).

        Parameters:
        x - the translation distance along the x-axis.
        y - the translation distance along the y-axis.

      • appendTranslation

        default void appendTranslation(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Tuple2DReadOnly translation)
        Rotates, then adds the given translation to this pose 2D.

        Use this method if the translation is expressed in the local coordinates described by this pose 2D. Otherwise, use prependTranslation(Tuple2DReadOnly).

        Parameters:
        translation - tuple containing the translation to apply to this pose 2D. Not modified.

      • appendRotation

        default void appendRotation(double yaw)
        Adds the given yaw angle to the orientation of this pose 2D.

        If the position part of this pose 2D is to be rotated by the given angle, use prependRotation(double).

        Parameters:
        yaw - the angle about the z-axis to append to this pose 2D.

      • appendRotation

        default void appendRotation(Orientation2DReadOnly orientation)
        Adds the given orientation to the orientation of this pose 2D.

        If the position part of this pose 2D is to be rotated by the given orientation, use prependRotation(Orientation2DReadOnly).

        Parameters:
        orientation - the orientation to append to this pose 2D. Not modified.

      • applyTransform

        default void applyTransform(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.interfaces.Transform transform)
        Transforms the position and orientation parts of this pose 2D by the given transform.
        Specified by:
        applyTransform in interface us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable
        Parameters:
        transform - the geometric transform to apply on this pose 2D. Not modified.
        Throws:
        us.ihmc.euclid.exceptions.NotAMatrix2DException - if the rotation part of transform is not a transformation in the XY plane.

      • applyInverseTransform

        default void applyInverseTransform(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.interfaces.Transform transform)
        Transforms the position and orientation parts of this pose 2D by the inverse of the given transform.
        Specified by:
        applyInverseTransform in interface us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable
        Parameters:
        transform - the geometric transform to apply on this pose 2D. Not modified.
        Throws:
        us.ihmc.euclid.exceptions.NotAMatrix2DException - if the rotation part of transform is not a transformation in the XY plane.
